name: securityMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the security mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the security mode.

parameters.name: predefinedSecurityMode
parameters.description: The predefined security mode to set (e.g., disarmed, armed stay, armed away).

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The security mode to set (derived from predefinedSecurityMode).

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: The security course to set (derived from mode).
